description: This is a practice quiz test app to assist with preparations for the mandatory theoretical test that all Zimbabweans must take to obtain their driver's license. Some rules may also be helpful to citizens other countries as well!

Learn a new language with the world’s most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by language experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

And now, you can learn Math and Music the Duolingo way!  

Build real-world math skills – from calculating tips to identifying patterns – and sharpen your mental math in our Math course.

Learn how to read music and play familiar songs on your device in our Music course – no instrument required.

Whether you’re learning for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you’ll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?
• Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters keep you motivated to build solid skills across language, math and music.

• Duolingo works. Designed by learning experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term knowledge retention.

• Track your progress. Work toward your learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

• Join 300+ million learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

• Every course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian. And now, learn Math and Music with our newest courses!

What the world is saying about Duolingo:

“Far and away the best language-learning app.” –The Wall Street Journal

“This free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I’ve tried… lessons come in the form of brief challenges – speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions – that keep me coming back for more.” –The New York Times

“Duolingo may hold the secret to the future of education.” – TIME Magazine

“…Duolingo is cheerful, lighthearted and fun…” - Forbes

“Our favorite language app…” - CNET

If you like Duolingo, try Super Duolingo for 14 days free! Learn a language fast with no ads, and get fun perks like Unlimited Hearts and Monthly Streak Repair.

If you choose to purchase Super Duolingo, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Whether you're just starting out or looking to level up your skills, LingoMy is the perfect language-learning companion.

The Free version of Driving Theory Test 2024 UK allows you to practice all revision questions, answers, explanations. Revise individual topics, take full-length tests, and track your progress to Driving Test Success.

APPLICATION FEATURES
***Free Theory Test***
Take unlimited mock tests which are just like the actual exam. Endless practice tests will help you to familiarize yourself with the actual test system. You can create a random test from a bank of 850+ official theory test revision questions, up-to-date for 2020.

*** Wrong questions saved ***
Flag the wrong marked questions on a well-designed user interface to review them again later (for example, 60 minutes before the exam).

***Theory questions by Category***
You will learn knowledge-based questions from a variety of different categories. There are 14 categories which encompass about 900+ questions, 50 of which will be randomly chosen to appear in your test. These categories include:

Attitude
Documents
Hazard Awareness
Incidents, Accidents, and Emergencies
Motorway Rules
Other Types of Vehicle
Road and Traffic Signs
Rules of the Road
Safety and Your Vehicle
Safety Margins
Vehicle Handling
Vehicle Loading
Vulnerable Road Users

***Theory Questions Detail Explanation***
Each practice question contains an explanation of the answer from the Theory Exam, increasing the effectiveness of your preparation.

***Interactive Hazard Perception Clips***
Practice from 100+ high-quality, interactive hazard perception video clips. Take full-length, realistic hazard perception tests to prepare yourself for the official exam.

***UK Highway Code***
The complete Highway Code 2020 contains all the rules, regulations, and traffic signs from The Official UK Highway Code.

***UK Traffic and Road Signs***
Includes all the latest traffic/road signs published by the Department of Transport (of the year 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017,2018,2019) which you need to know to be a better driver.

Support: If you experience any issues while downloading this app, please contact us at geeg.yazilim@gmail.com

This product includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

WHAT YOU GET WITH TALKPAL
Start speaking from day one with bite-sized lessons. Practise with immersive AI language learning modes designed to build real fluency and improve your speaking skills:
1. Chat Mode: speak with a GPT-powered personalised AI language tutor

SKILLS YOU WILL IMPROVE

- Listening: understand natural conversations and diverse accents

FOCUS ON YOUR GOALS

- Career: practise interviews, meetings and presentations

FEEDBACK AND PROGRESS TRACKING
- Personalised AI pronunciation and grammar corrections
- Track progress with streaks, achievements and personalised lesson stats
- Short, efficient and engaging practice sessions
- Improve speaking, listening, writing and reading skills

WHY TALKPAL
- Improve speaking and fluency with interactive language learning modes: Chat Mode, Word Mode, Sentence Mode, Dialogue Mode, Call Mode, Roleplays, Characters, Debates, Photo Mode, and personalised AI-generated Courses tailored to your level and learning goals
- Join millions of learners and become a language learning champion. Download now and speak for real. Build your fluency with Talkpal – anywhere, anytime

COMPANY AND FEEDBACK

the application contains more than 2000 Similar questions of the test to revise your rules of the road
50 series of highway code tests written by driving school instructors to help you train in the real conditions of the highway code test and ensure your success.

The ten new themes of this new highway code are:

road traffic
the driver
the road
other users
various concepts including in particular administrative documents and offenses
first aid
picking up and leaving your vehicle
mechanics and equipment
passenger and vehicle safety
the environment

217 / 5000
Translation results

○ Training with detailed explanations at the end of each question

Ready to Speak English Confidently? 

Welcome to Learna AI English Tutor App, your all-in-one solution for mastering the English language! Learn English with grammar, speaking, reading, pronunciation, and vocabulary practices designed to enhance your proficiency in every aspect of the language.

With Learna AI, you can speak English confidently and effectively through interactive conversations. Our app takes your language learning journey beyond traditional methods. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Learna AI is here to help you learn & speak English in a fun, engaging, and personalized way.

English practices and lessons are guided by our Learna AI Virtual Chat Character, offering tailored support as you learn. You can speak with the AI character to improve both your speaking and listening skills. The app provides real-time feedback, helping you speak correctly and refine your vocabulary as you go. This makes learning English more dynamic, interactive, and efficient, as you can practice speaking at your own pace.

Learna AI also focuses on improving your grammar skills. You’ll learn essential grammar rules and practice them through a variety of exercises that help reinforce your understanding. The grammar practices are designed to gradually improve your proficiency, allowing you to speak with accuracy and clarity. As you learn grammar, you will build a stronger foundation for your speaking and writing skills.

Vocabulary plays a critical role in speaking English fluently. With Learna AI, you can improve your vocabulary by learning new words and phrases that are practical and useful in daily conversations. Each lesson focuses on building your vocabulary, ensuring you have a broad range of words at your disposal. The app features vocabulary practice that adapts to your level, helping you speak more naturally and confidently.

Your pronunciation also gets a boost with Learna AI. As you speak, you’ll receive valuable feedback to improve your pronunciation. The app includes exercises specifically designed to help you master English pronunciation and speak clearly. Pronunciation practices allow you to correct mistakes and sound more authentic when speaking English.

Track your progress with detailed performance metrics and milestones. Set learning goals to monitor your achievements and celebrate your successes. With continuous practice, you’ll see your speaking skills improve, and your vocabulary will expand. By setting specific goals, you ensure that each practice session is focused and effective.

Learna AI Language Tutor Features:

English Conversation Practice with Learna AI Virtual Chat Character
Get feedback from Learna AI for your mistakes
Learn English Grammar with tailored lessons
Improve your English Reading Skills
Enrich your English Vocabulary with daily vocabulary practices & Learn new words 
Spelling Check and vocabulary reinforcement
Perfect your English Pronunciation through interactive exercises
Enhance your English Speaking Skills through practical speaking practice
Track your progress and set goals to continually improve
Speak, practice, and learn today with Learna AI, your partner in mastering the English language!

Welcome to Keiki World — the ultimate learning app for toddlers and kids aged 2-6+ that transforms playtime into powerful early learning experiences. Keiki World is 100% ad-free, kidSAFE Certified, and a Mom’s Choice Award winner.
Approved by early-learning experts, Keiki World meets the specific developmental needs of toddlers and preschoolers — helping parents raise future-ready learners who master preschool basics while also developing creativity, problem-solving skills, and the confidence to figure things out.
Flash cards, colorful worksheets, toddler games, interactive cartoons, and more essential activities for your little one. Trusted by families in more than 170 countries, Keiki

- Hand-eye coordination

Keiki World is 100% ad-free, kidSAFE Certified, and a Mom’s Choice Award winner.

Keiki World Approach
Daily consistent learning – Short, interactive sessions fit naturally into everyday family life, building steady progress and curiosity.
Future-ready skills – Every game nurtures early academics, creativity, critical thinking, communication, and emotional intelligence to prepare kids for school and for life
Screen-free practice – More than 500 printables, worksheets, and hands-on activities extend learning into real-world family moments.

Expert-Crafted
Expert-designed curriculum – Developed by educators and child-development specialists to support each stage of growth and confidence.

Keiki World Interactive Activities
Make your kid’s screen time fun and meaningful with games and activities like:
- ABC Puzzles – Train letter recognition & phonics with drag-and-drop puzzles.
- Trace Letters – Practice writing in a cosmic interface that builds focus and fine-motor skills.
- Memory Cards – Find pairs and boost memory on topics from ABC to animals and colors.
- Jigsaw Puzzles – Assemble images to learn shapes, imagination, and logical thinking.
- Fill the Gaps – Match objects by shape and color to strengthen attention and logic.
- Funny Kids Songs – Learn letters, numbers, animals, and phonics through music.
Plus: Educational Cartoons, Sorting, Cooking — and even more!

Worksheets & Offline Learning
Over 500 printables and skill-based worksheets, organized by topic, provide more than 400 hours of purposeful learning. They include: Writing, Speech & Language, Math, Logic, Creativity, Dinosaurs, and Useful Tips for Parents. Each one is designed to nurture curiosity, independence, and a lifelong love of learning.
Your child can learn colors, numbers, letters, animals, drawing, and much more — all in one app!

The Learner's Test App offers the most advanced test system to your device offering practice +370 up to-date questions.

With this application you will make progress more quickly than with any other traditional method, as you can take the tests wherever and whenever you want, without the need to be connected: at the bus stop, in a bar, in the classroom, at work or at the dentist’s waiting room!

The application is divided into the following sections:

* Driver Knowledge Test - DKT:

Perform a simulation under the same conditions as the official RTA test. To pass the exam learner are required to answer at least 12 DKT questions correctly among the 15 general knowledge questions and at least 29 correctly among the 30 road safety question.

* Practice by Topics:

Test your knowledge by practicing by categories. The bank of questions from the RTA is divided into 10 categories, these are:

- General Knowledge section
- Alcohol and Drugs
- Fatigue and Defensive Driving
- Intersections
- Traffic Lights and Lanes
- Negligent Driving
- Pedestrians
- Seat Belts and Restraints
- Speed Limits
- Traffic Signs

You can select one or more categories to practice. You can also perform rapid tests for 10, 20 or 30 questions.

* Progress Monitor:

The application saves the result of each question answered and a history of failures and successes to offer the most advanced system of all the statistics.

*** Application Features ***

- Intelligent learning system: The questions are selected using an algorithm taking into account your latest scores and the questions that you need to practice more.

- Modern and easy to use interface with features including:-
~ Test simulator
~ Practice by category
~ Statistics module to track and monitor your progress

BetterSpeak: Your AI Tutor for Language Speaking
Do you want to speak English more fluently, confidently, and naturally? BetterSpeak is your personal AI English tutor designed to help you practice speaking through lifelike conversations, real-time corrections, and personalized feedback. 

Whether you’re preparing for exams, traveling abroad, attending meetings, or simply aiming to sound more natural, BetterSpeak turns your smartphone into your personal speaking coach.

- Smarter Than a Textbook – Your AI Language Tutor
Unlike traditional apps that only teach vocabulary and grammar, BetterSpeak puts speaking first. You’ll talk with an AI tutor that understands your strengths, identifies your weak points, and adapts lessons to your learning style and goals.

- Practice English with a Lifelike Avatar Tutor
Have face-to-face speaking practice with a friendly, expressive AI tutor. This animated coach helps you stay motivated while correcting your pronunciation, grammar, and sentence structure in real time—just like a real tutor would.

- Real-Life Speaking Practice Without the Fear
Feel shy or unsure about your English? BetterSpeak creates a safe and supportive space to practice real-life conversations—from job interviews to airport dialogues or casual small talk—without fear of judgment.

- Progress You Can See and Feel
Track your growth over time with detailed reports on pronunciation clarity, fluency, grammar accuracy, and vocabulary usage. Watch your confidence grow as your English improves session by session.

- A Personalized Program That Fits You
No more generic lessons. BetterSpeak builds a custom speaking journey tailored to your level and needs—whether you're a beginner or intermediate learner. Focus on the skills that matter most to you.

- Multilingual Support for Beginners
Just starting out? You can learn and practice English even if your native language is Spanish, Portuguese, Turkish, Italian, German, or French. Your AI tutor supports you in your own language while guiding you toward fluent English.

- Real-Time Corrections & Instant Feedback
BetterSpeak doesn’t just listen—it responds. You’ll receive instant, constructive feedback on your grammar, vocabulary usage, pronunciation, and fluency, helping you adjust and improve on the spot.

- Motivating & Gamified Learning
Set daily speaking goals, earn badges, collect points, and build streaks that keep you engaged. BetterSpeak turns language learning into a habit—and a fun one.

- Built for Real People with Real Goals
From passing the IELTS or TOEFL to improving business communication or daily conversation skills, BetterSpeak is your intelligent, always-available tutor for practical speaking success.

- Download BetterSpeak Today
Join thousands of learners who are unlocking their English speaking potential with BetterSpeak. Say goodbye to hesitation, and hello to confident, clear communication.



We value your feedback! If you have suggestions or feedback to make BetterSpeak better, we'd love to hear from you. Don't hesitate to contact us at support@betterspeak.com

Preply: Learn Languages with Real Tutors - Anytime, Anywhere

Looking for the best way to learn a new language? Preply is more than just another language learning app - it’s a complete online platform that connects you with thousands of professional tutors for live, personalised lessons. Unlike gamified apps that rely on repetitive exercises, Preply combines flexible self-study with the structure, accountability, and human connection of real teachers.

With the Preply app, you can:

• Learn on the go - Book and attend lessons from anywhere, straight from your phone.
• Access thousands of expert tutors - Choose teachers by price, ratings, availability, or specialism.
• Practise real conversations - Build confidence by speaking with a live tutor instead of memorising phrases.
• Enjoy flexible scheduling - Book lessons that fit your routine, whether daily practice or weekly study.
• Study over 90 languages - English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Arabic, and more.
• Track your progress - Follow your learning journey with clear goals and personalised feedback.

Why Choose Preply?

Most language apps stop at vocabulary drills or games. Preply takes you further by connecting you with real people who tailor every lesson to your goals. Preparing for exams? Looking to boost your career prospects or improve pronunciation? Preply tutors adapt lessons to help you reach fluency faster.

Key Benefits of the Preply App

• A structured alternative to gamified apps : Skip endless exercises and focus on meaningful progress.
• Personalised learning : Lessons tailored to your level, learning style, and objectives.
• Affordable options : Tutors for every budget, with transparent pricing and secure payments.
• Seamless experience : The same trusted Preply platform, optimised for mobile so you can learn anytime.
• Trusted worldwide : Millions of learners already use Preply to achieve their language goals.

How It Works

• Download the Preply app.
• Choose your tutor : Filter by language, specialism, budget, or availability.
• Book your first lesson : Flexible scheduling makes it easy to start.
• Learn & track your progress : Stay motivated with real results and ongoing support.

Whether you’re a beginner or advanced learner, preparing for exams, travelling abroad, or building an international career, Preply helps you succeed. With Preply, you’re not just downloading an app, you’re joining a global learning community designed to support your growth.

Learn languages your way, with the flexibility of an app and the reliability of real classes.

Start your language journey today. Download Preply and see why it’s the best app for live tutoring, online language lessons, and personalised learning.

The King James Version (KJV), commonly known as the Authorized Version (AV) or King James Bible (KJB), is an English translation of the Christian Bible for the Church of England begun in 1604 and completed in 1611. First printed by the King's Printer Robert Barker, this was the third translation into English to be approved by the English Church authorities. The first was the Great Bible commissioned in the reign of King Henry VIII, and the second was the Bishops' Bible of 1568. In January 1604, King James I convened the Hampton Court Conference where a new English version was conceived in response to the perceived problems of the earlier translations as detected by the Puritans, a faction within the Church of England.
James gave the translators instructions intended to guarantee that the new version would conform to the ecclesiology and reflect the episcopal structure of the Church of England and its belief in an ordained clergy. The translation was done by 47 scholars, all of whom were members of the Church of England. In common with most other translations of the period, the New Testament was translated from Greek, the Old Testament was translated from Hebrew text, while the Apocrypha were translated from the Greek and Latin. In the Book of Common Prayer (1662), the text of the Authorized Version replaced the text of the Great Bible – for Epistle and Gospel readings – and as such was authorized by Act of Parliament. By the first half of the 18th century, the Authorized Version was effectively unchallenged as the English translation used in Anglican and Protestant churches. Over the course of the 18th century, the Authorized Version supplanted the Latin Vulgate as the standard version of scripture for English speaking scholars. Today, the most used edition of the King James Bible, and often identified as plainly the King James Version, especially in the United States, closely follows the standard text of 1769, edited by Benjamin Blayney at Oxford.

Classroom is a free service for schools, non-profits and anyone with a personal Google Account. Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connect – inside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate and stay organised.

Classroom is designed to help teachers create, collect and mark assignments paperlessly, including time-saving features like the ability to automatically make a copy of a Google Document for each student. It also creates Drive folders for each assignment and for each student to help keep everyone organised.

Students can keep track of what's due on the Assignments page and begin working with just a click. Teachers can quickly see who has or hasn't completed the work, and provide direct, real-time feedback and marks from within Classroom.

With the mobile app for iOS, students and teachers can view their classes and communicate with their classmates in real time. Students can open their assignments and work on them right from their iPhone or iPad. Teachers can keep track of who has handed in work and mark the assignment – at school or on the go. Students and teachers receive notifications when they have new content in Classroom, so they are always up to date.

There are many benefits of using Classroom:

Easy to set up
Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.

Saves time
The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.

Improves organisation
Students can see all of their assignments on an Assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.

Enhances communication
Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.

Secure
Like the rest of Google Workspace for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, and never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes.

Permissions notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Microphone: Needed to enable audio capture for recording videos to be posted to Classroom.
Photos: Needed to allow the user to attach photos or videos to Classroom. Photos or videos posted to Classroom will be stored on Google servers in order to show them in Classroom.

- Professionals seeking impactful learning that fits into their busy lives.

Subscription Information:
Our subscription plans include $12.99/month with no trial, $29.99 for 3 months with no trial, and $79.99/year with a 7-day free trial, granting unlimited access to VIP features during the subscription period. Your payment will be charged to your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase or after the 7-day trial if applicable. During the trial period, you can manage your subscription and cancel by going to your 'Account Settings.' After being charged, you may turn off auto-renewal by visiting the same section. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current period. When canceling a subscription, it will remain active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but no refunds will be issued for the current subscription. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited upon purchasing a subscription.
